snippet.title: Actress Ellen Page: "I am gay"
snippet.description:
* Hollywood actress Ellen Page, known for her role in the movie "Juno," announced she is gay, in a very public way.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/02/15/showbiz/page-comes-out/index.html

snippet.title: 'Slumdog' star Freida Pinto: Film industry too male-dominated
snippet.description:
* In her debut film, "Slumdog Millionaire," Freida Pinto won plaudits for her portrayal of a girl from the slums groomed for a life of prostitution. Off screen the Hollywood actress is now lending her voice to save other girls from that very same fate.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/06/27/business/slumdog-star-freida-pinto-film/index.html

snippet.title: Actresses call out Romney on abortion in new ad
snippet.description:
* (CNN) – Hollywood actresses Scarlett Johansson, Eva Longoria and Kerry Washington are featured condemning Republicans for their stance on abortion in a new political ad from the liberal group MoveOn.org. The spot, released Monday and directed by noted...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2012/10/15/actresses-call-out-romney-on-abortion-in-new-ad/

snippet.title: Jessica Chastain to play Princess Diana?
snippet.description:
* Up-and-coming starlet Jessica Chastain may play the late Princess Diana in an upcoming biopic, reports industry blog Thompson on Hollywood. The actress is reportedly in talks to play Di in “Caught in Flight,” to be directed by Oliver Hirschbiegel...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2011/11/08/jessica-chastain-to-play-princess-diana/

snippet.title: In the Industry: Wilde will play a mom, Criss to kiss Wiig
snippet.description:
* Former child star Miley Cyrus is moving up in Hollywood. The actress/singer is set to star in and produce a God-themed comedy project with Paramount, according to the Hollywood Reporter. Plot details aren't being revealed yet, but the movie, which...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2011/08/02/in-the-industry-wilde-will-play-a-mom-criss-to-kiss-wiig/

snippet.title: Sharon Stone owns up to plastic surgery
snippet.description:
* Sharon Stone is boldly going where few Hollywood actresses dare to go: she’s owning up to having plastic surgery. The bombshell actress told More magazine that following her 2004 divorce from San Francisco newspaper editor Phil Bronstein, she felt...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2010/05/19/sharon-stone-owns-up-to-plastic-surgery/
